description: Main source file for a Flutter mobile app implementing a Recipe Explorer application. It defines the app's widget tree, routing, UI components, data models (Recipe), and state management via providers (RecipeProvider, AuthProvider). It includes screens for listing recipes, searching, viewing details, adding/editing recipes, user login/registration, and user profile management.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: Data model representing a recipe with properties such as id, title, imageUrl, duration, average rating, ingredients, category, creator, and instructions.

classes.name: RecipeProvider
classes.description: State management class that holds the list of recipes, favorites, current category, search term, and provides methods for adding, updating, deleting, filtering recipes, and persisting data via shared preferences.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: Manages user authentication state with simple login/register/logout functionality using username strings.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes Flutter bindings, locks device orientation to portrait, and runs the root widget.
